data.meta_description: Radhika Apte is an Indian actress. In the year 2005, she made her Bollywood debut with the role of Shahid Kapoor’s sister in the film ‘Waah Life Ho To Aisi.’ Radhika Apte’s popular films are, Manjhi: The Mountain Man (2015), Badlapur (2015), Shor in the City (2010), Phobia (2016), Rakta Charitra (2010), and Monica O My Darling (2022).
data.text:
Radhika Apte is an Indian actress. She was born on 7 September 1985 in Pune, Maharashtra. Her zodiac sign is Virgo. She earned a graduate degree in Economics and Maths from Fergusson College, Pune. She also holds a diploma in Dance Sciences.

Her father, Charudutt Apte, and her mother, are both doctors.

Radhika Apte is married to Benedict Taylor.

Radhika Apte’s favourites

Her hobbies include dancing and performing in dramas.

She likes to eat chicken biryani and caramel custard.

Her favourite actors are Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.

Her favourite colour is green.

Her favourite restaurants are Blue Nile, Kayani Bakery, and Café Goodluck.

Interesting facts about Radhika Apte

Radhika had a keen interest in studying maths during her school years. Her grandmother, Madhumalati Apte, a PhD holder in mathematics, inspired her interest in the subject.

Apart from being a bright student, she actively took part in co-curricular activities. At the age of 18, she started taking part in Marathi plays.

Radhika’s first Marathi play was ‘Nako Re Baba’ that was performed in the year 2003.

Radhika Apte’s Bollywood debut

In the year 2005, Radhika Apte made her Bollywood debut with the role of Shahid Kapoor’s sister in the film ‘Waah Life Ho To Aisi.’

She rose to popularity with the success of the 2010 film ‘Shor in the City.

With her varied acting projects, Radhika Apte has established herself as a successful Indian actor.

Radhika Apte’s successful acting career

She is known for her bold roles and extraordinary acting performances in films.

She has worked in Bengali, Telugu, Tamil, and Malayalam film industries.

Despite her busy film schedule, she still performs in Marathi plays. Radhika is associated with Mohit Takalkar drama group called ‘Aasakt.’

Radhika Apte is a close friend of Kalki Koechlin.

Radhika Apte’s marriage

In an interview, Nawazuddin Siddique once revealed that he had a secret affair with Radhika Apte.

In the year 2012, Radhika Apte married her boyfriend, Benedict Taylor. He is a London-based musician.

Radhika Apte’s filmography

In the year 2014, Radhika Apte’s nine films were released and most of them received critical acclaim.

Radhika Apte’s popular films are, Manjhi: The Mountain Man (2015), Badlapur (2015), Shor in the City (2010), Phobia (2016), Rakta Charitra (2010), Raat Akeli Hai (2020), Monica O My Darling (2022), The Wedding Guest (2018), Kabali (2016), Pad Man (2018), Lust Stories (2018), Andhadhun (2018), Parched (2015) and Mrs Undercover (2023).
